us.radiri.merc.gfx

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.radiri.merc.gfx.Animation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Resource

    public class Animation
extends Object
implements Resource
    An easy to use animation class. Just render, and watch the moving picture.
    Author:
    wessles

         SpriteSheet texs,
         int startframe,
         int endframe)
        Parameters:
        frameratemillis - The frame rate in milliseconds
        texs - The textures, or frames.
        startframe - The first frame of the animation.
        endframe - The last frame of the animation.
